name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TheAtlPhoto: Day 7 of the 2020 Hubble Space Telescope Advent Calendar: A Quiet Center. The delicate, feathery nature of the spiral arms of galaxy NGC 2775 and smooth galactic bulge indicate that the recent history of star formation in its center has been fairly quiet. https://t.co/oVvhgBoeYW https://t.co/vrdg0A5sS1

text:

This week ⁦@TheAtlantic⁩ : How to help adult children with attunement over financial support https://t.co/Jdf2rIEhoQ

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JohnGHendy: How does it feel to be grieving a loved one and hear the president callously tell the nation not to let the virus "dominate" your life?

“I just—to this day, it almost leaves me speechless to think about how he handled that moment."

https://t.co/9rc2BNHF5j

name: TheAtlantic
text: "In less than 50 days, Donald Trump will be an ex-president, and the importance of that can hardly be overstated. It is a necessary condition if we are to find our way out of our epistemic crisis, if hardly a sufficient one," @Peter_Wehner writes: https://t.co/hGs9MRH58L
